scripts.dev: (cd server && nodemon -e ts --exec "tsc --build && node build/app.js" &) && (cd client && npm run startclient &)
scripts.build: cd server && tsc --build && cd ../client && npm run buildclient && rm -rf ../server/static && mv build ../server/static && git checkout -b deploy && git add ../server/static && git add ../server/build && git commit -m "deploy" && git push --force --set-upstream origin deploy && git checkout - && git branch -D deploy
scripts.server: git checkout deploy && git reset --hard origin/deploy && node server/build/app.js
